Public NotInheritable Class LpNormalizingEstimator Inherits LpNormalizingEstimatorBase

Docs.summary: Lp Normalizing estimator allow you take columns and normalize them individually by rescaling them to unit norm.

Public Sub New (env As IHostEnvironment, columns As ValueTuple(Of String, String)(), Optional normKind As LpNormalizingEstimatorBase.NormalizerKind = Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Projections.LpNormalizingEstimatorBase+NormalizerKind.L2Norm, Optional substractMean As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: Pairs of columns to run the normalization on.
Type of norm to use to normalize each sample.
Subtract mean from each value before normalizing.
Docs.summary:
The LpNormalizer transforms, normalizes vectors (rows) individually by rescaling them to unit norm (L2, L1 or LInf).
Performs the following operation on a vector X:
Y = (X - M) / D
where M is mean and D is either L2 norm, L1 norm or LInf norm.
Docs.remarks: Scaling inputs to unit norms is a common operation for text classification or clustering. For more information see:
